content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 stone, and my inventory now contains both 10 coal and 10 stone. 
# With these resources, I can now craft a Stone Furnace.

# I will check the recipe for the Stone Furnace again to confirm the requirements.

furnace_recipe = get_prototype_recipe(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Get the recipe for Stone Furnace
print(f"Furnace Recipe: {furnace_recipe}")

# Now that I have 10 stone and 10 coal, I can proceed to craft the Stone Furnace.
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=1)  # Craft 1 Stone Furnace. 
print(f"Furnace crafted. Updated Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after crafting.
